attributes.action: Request the BBC to stockpile iPlayer with archive tv during the Corona pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Because we need entertaining in these uncertain times and whilst the license fee is being questioned, let’s remind ourselves why the BBC is where it is and so everyone can get their monies worth.
attributes.background: Request that the BBC start piling up archive programming onto the iPlayer. Entertainment, educational, DIY, cooking, anything!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the BBC.
